holidays.title: National Irish Coffee Day
holidays.description: The perfect occasion to warm yourself up with a tasty, boozy treat.

holidays.title: Opposite Day
holidays.description: Opposite Day on January 25 is one of the more confusing holidays in the calendar.

holidays.title: A Room Of One’s Own Day
holidays.description: Independence and education are critical for society at large, not just women.

holidays.title: Burns Supper
holidays.description: Get your bagpipes ready to play because the Burns Supper is here again!

holidays.title: Fluoride Day
holidays.description: Smile wide and let’s look at how the world’s pearly whites benefit from fluoride.

holidays.title: National Bible Sunday
holidays.description: Get your bible and hymn books ready to celebrate National Bible Sunday in style!

holidays.title: National Fish Taco Day
holidays.description: Tantalize your taste buds as we celebrate one of the world’s most famous fishy dishes.

holidays.title: National Florida Day
holidays.description: Today, we’re celebrating Florida (not the musician, the state). So don’t sleep on these festivities!

holidays.title: National IV Nurse Day
holidays.description: Join us as we lift our hands to salute these committed and dedicated professionals.

holidays.title: Observe the Weather Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about what makes Observe the Weather Day such a special day!

holidays.title: St. Dwynwen's Day
holidays.description: As the Welsh equivalent to Valentine’s Day, St. Dwynwen’s is all about spreading love!

holidays.title: Tatiana Day
holidays.description: Prepare yourself as we celebrate one of the most memorable days of the year!

holidays.title: World Leprosy Day
holidays.description: Leprosy is a reality and, together, we need to care for the people affected by it.

holidays.title: Alicia Keys’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nobody does it better than Alicia Keys when it comes to soulful R&B artists!

holidays.title: Calum Hood’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician has a way of capturing our hearts. How does he do it?

holidays.title: Laura Johnston’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her incredible charm, this YouTube celebrity is the star of her family’s vlogs.

holidays.title: Lil Mosey’s Birthday
holidays.description: SoundCloud provided him with a taste of success, prompting him to take his musical career seriously.

holidays.title: Robert Burns’s Birthday
holidays.description: A well-known figure with a diverse legacy of poetry ranging from sensitive to politically radical.

holidays.title: Wong Yuk-hei’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lucas Wong is a rising star who will continue to wow and win hearts!
